tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change news around the world
name: Climate Chane Live
title: Climate Chane Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News
api_list.description: Get news of only one newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-chane-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-chane-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-chane-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-chane-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climat Change News
api_list.description: Return all news about climate change from over the world
api_list.code:
